channel.title: AncientBlitz - New Revolution for PI!
channel.description:
This is my new project, AncientBlitz. It was created by Asshole_rule and Imsuperman05, the base is super_asshole. All I have done so far is fixed up some client bugs everything in the pictures is credits to Imsuperman05 or Asshole_rule. I just started the project yesterday and I will be fixing all the bugs before adding any features. All bugs are client sided. The base is extremely stable besides for these bugs, it has awesome new 600+ map's for good area's but also has 377 maps in area that will be popular to create less lag. The server is setup very nice, all skills are programmed including hunter with Chin's and Bird's. Construction is added but I have not yet found out how to work it. I'm assuming Asshole_rule added the Grandexchange interfaces <3 + the hawt summoning interfaces with switching from scroll's and pouches. Now for some media! And if your a client programmer please visit this link! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,536097.0.html Thanks!
[center][size=14pt]There won't be any features added until bugs are fixed! Please do not flame because of this![/size][/center]
[center] [size=18pt]Media![/size]
Bird hunting! [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/6821/birdai.png[/img] Hunting Chinchompas! [img]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/9580/chins.png[/img] Hunting Imp's with new awesome maps! [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/3904/impso.png[/img] New Maps! [img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/3389/coolplace.png[/img] [img]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/9007/coolplace2.png[/img] Grand Exchange! [img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/4240/88807980.png[/img] [img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/3765/ge1.png[/img] [img]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/5584/ge2u.png[/img] [img]http://img710.imageshack.us/img710/5288/ge3.png[/img] Summoning interfaces 100%! [img]http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/939/pocuhes.png[/img] [img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/8868/scrolls.png[/img] Prayer's work! [img]http://img864.imageshack.us/img864/2332/prayerj.png[/img] Construction!! [img]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/218/80697290.png[/img]
Videos!
Construction: http://youtu.be/z2GL5BtsSK4[/center]
REMEMBER! 99% CREDITS TO ASSHOLE_RULE AND IMSUPERMAN05 1% to me :)

item.title: AncientBlitz - New Revolution for PI!
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

asshole_rule:

Awesome, has a lot of potential, you just need to put in enough time. Good luck.

I will be I got a 10 day break coming up starting tonight. Thanks for the positive feed back also. (Only person so far that did)

Read full topic

item.title: AncientBlitz - New Revolution for PI!
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Huh? I don’t have a problem, I saw the credits, don’t get pissy. I’m happy you’re using their base.

I thought they were your interfaces, I posted before I read the credits.

Read full topic

item.title: AncientBlitz - New Revolution for PI!
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:2, topic:433380”]I like your interfaces.

EDIT: They’re Nick’s. >.<[/quote]
What is your problem? I put proper credits but yet people still have the guts to say shit. I swear to God this community needs to grow up.

Read full topic
